inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Wegener's granulomatosis or microscopic polyangiitis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed patient of Wegener's granulomatosis or microscopic polyangiitis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Must be experiencing a disease flare characterized by: (a) active disease with a Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score for Wegener's granulomatosis (BVAS/WG) of 3 or greater that would normally require treatment with CYC
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Must be experiencing a disease flare characterized by: (b) disease severe enough to require treatment with CYC
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be positive for either PR3-ANCA or MPO-ANCA at the screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to use acceptable forms of contraception for the duration of the study and for up to 1 year after stopping study medications
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to report pregnancies (female participants or male participants' partners) occurring at any time during the study and for up to 1 year after stopping study medications
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Parent or guardian willing to provide informed consent, if applicable
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Churg-Strauss Syndrome according to the definitions of the Chapel Hill Consensus Conference
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have limited disease that would not normally be treated with CYC
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Requires mechanical ventilation because of alveolar hemorrhage
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of severe allergic reactions to human or chimeric monoclonal antibodies
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have a deep-space infection, such as osteomyelitis, septic arthritis, or pneumonia complicated by pleural cavity or lung abscess, within 6 months prior to study entry
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of or current hepatitis B or C infection
exclusion.label: not_met
